sentence.text: First, a novel variation c.460-650AAAAAG was found in our study which might cause premature termination of splicing of the conserved domain in WDR36; second, c.1494+1111GAAAAT (rs13178997) had significantly different frequency in our JOAG patients compared to the reference frequency on NCBI; third, a variation c.710+30CAAAAT (rs10038177) was found in our study, which had already been reported to be related to high-pressure glaucoma.
